value:
$WmMPID_冬祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_WinterFes17,Face|$w0|Hee-hee! I've been waiting. Everyone
should have fun during the festival!
$SspVOICE_LIZ_WINTER01_SKILL_3|Let's party!$k$p

$WmMPID_舞踏祭黒アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_dance17,Face|$w0|Everyone's singing to celebrate this
special occasion. How lovely!
$SspVOICE_AQUA_DANCE_SKILL_1|My heart is singing!$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ah! W-wait a minute... I'm still
getting ready!$k$p

$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|$w0|Sorry to keep you waiting! All right!
Here we go, together now—
$SspVOICE_SHARON_SPRING02_SKILL_4|I'm hopping your way!$k$p

$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|$w0|Hee-hee-hee! Gimme some candy, or
I'll play a trick on you! That's right...
$SspVOICE_NONO_HALLOWEEN01_SKILL_4|Witchy Nowi's here!$k$p

$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|$w0|During a celebration, give a gift to a
friend. Here you go! Just remember...
$SspVOICE_LILINA_VALENTINE01_SKILL_4|I'm not all sweet!$k$p
